text: Coprolalia is a condition that affects about 15% of people with Tourette syndrome. Someone with coprolalia will use words that make people feel uncomfortable so often that it is hard to control. This is often in the form of a stream of curse words. People who have Tourette syndrome are not the only people who experience coprolalia. For example, it can happen in people who have had a stroke,Miller J (2001). The Voice in Tourette Syndrome. NEW LITERARY HISTORY 32.3 or who have schizophrenia. ==References== Category:Medical signs Category:Obscenity
title: Coprolalia
